title: Start Your Own BitTorrent Site!
description:
This is AK Nova

An innovative script that attempts to recreate features similar to the likes of Mininova, SeedPeer, and TPB frontend. Features a new design, crawling ability, cURL for single torrent scrapes + mass scrapes, and much much more!
 <a href="
http://mimicnet.bounceme.net/screenshot.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://mimicnet.bounceme.net/screenshot.jpg</a>

This Package is ready to go!

It includes:

    WOS Portable v2.1.1
    Apache v2.2.8
    MySQL v5.0.45
    PHP v4.4.7
    PHPMyAdmin v2.11.4
    AK Nova v3.5.0

When I say Ready to go i mean Ready to GO!
Extract wosportable to the root of a drive \"eg. C:\\wosportable\\\"
Start \"wos.exe\"
Once the server is started go to \"http://127.0.0.1/\" to view!
Edit the config file \"c:\\wosportable\\www\\config.php\" to suit your needs!

Ak Nova includes its own Tracker!
To check it out start the server and creat a torrent file with the tracker address
\"http://127.0.0.1/announce\"

Good Luck To All!

ProjectMimic
